"Design a table that can transform into a desk, a chair, and a bed with the press of a button."
"Create a table that has a built-in charging station for all your electronic devices."
"Design a table that can be easily reconfigured to accommodate different numbers of people and seating arrangements."
"Make a table that has a built-in sound system and LED lights that can be synchronized with music."
"Create a table that has a built-in water filtration system, so you can have fresh water on demand."
